amendment.description: To modify the authorization period of the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 162 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 19.
Amendment SA 162 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 111. (consideration: CR S1109; text: CR S1109) To modify the authorization period of the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 162 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 111.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 162 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 19.
